Class View

java.lang.Object
View
class View extends Object
Creates and manages the GUI,displays the current state of the Model (title, output1 and output2) and handles user input from buttons

    buttonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

    Start the GUI up
    called from Main
    important to create controls etc here and not in the constructor as we need things to be initialised in the correct order

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage window)
      Start the GUI up
      called from Main
      important to create controls etc here and not in the constructor as we need things to be initialised in the correct order

    • buttonClicked

      public void buttonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Fetched the label on the button and passes it to the controller's proccess method
      this is how the view talks to the controller
